title: Windjammer's Beachfront Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Buffet, Salad bar, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. At the beachfront Isla Grand Beach Resort Hotel, this place offers an extensive salad bar daily at lunch and dinner; occasionally a meat-less veggie or bean soup. Regular menu is not for vegans. No vegan options offered  on the regular menu.
